title: Shaping up: work and evaluation
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: Representatives from IBM. Ansett, and Labtam discuss issues related to evaluation. Issues are: venture capital, risk taking, research and development, goal setting, qualitative surveys are described in relation to company objectives. Designed as an icebreker in initiating a discussion on evaluation in education.
